recipe.title: Chai-Spiced Hot Chocolate
ingredients: 6 quarter-size slices fresh ginger plus 1/2 teaspoon grated peeled fresh ginger
instructions: Combine first 6 ingredients, 4 tablespoons brown sugar, and ginger slices in medium saucepan. Bring almost to simmer, whisking frequently. Remove from heat; cover and steep 10 minutes. Mix in 1/2 teaspoon vanilla.
Meanwhile, whisk cream, remaining 1 tablespoon brown sugar, grated ginger, and remaining 1/2 teaspoon vanilla in medium bowl to peaks.
Strain hot chocolate. Ladle into 6 mugs. Top each with dollop of ginger cream.
